title: Frieze, 1890–1920
description: A repeating design reminiscent of a hand mirror containing a three-flower group framed by four circles of dots contained within a dotted curved border. Connected by garlands and dotted curves to complementary design on an irregular striated background within bottom borders of garlands and horizontal stripes and top borders of dotted ornament. Printed in white, pale yellow, blue-green, gold, taupe and beige.

tombstone.epitaph:
Frieze, 1890–1920.
1890–1920. Machine-printed on machine-made paper. Gift of Victorian Collectibles. 1979-91-53.
